title: Social Media Guru – Viral Content Creation & Monetization
job_overview:
We’re looking for a talented and experienced social media guru who knows how to create viral clips that generate significant views and revenue. Whether it’s clipping streams, producing AI-generated content, or creating original, shareable videos, we need someone who can take full ownership of the content creation process and help grow our social media presence.

As the go-to person for this role, you’ll be responsible for:

Creating viral clips – Using your knowledge of trends, AI tools, and creative strategies to create engaging and shareable content.

Content management – Handling all aspects of content creation, from ideation to production.

Posting & Scheduling – Managing the consistent posting schedule across multiple platforms (TikTok, Instagram, YouTube, etc.).

Growth & Engagement – Growing followers, increasing views, and building a loyal community.

Monetization – Strategizing and implementing ways to generate revenue from content.

Key Qualifications:

Proven experience in creating viral content on platforms like TikTok, Instagram, YouTube, or other social media.

Strong understanding of how to drive engagement and build a following.

Familiarity with AI content tools and their potential for social media.

Ability to work independently, with minimal supervision.

Must be proactive, creative, and results-oriented.

What we offer:

Full autonomy over content creation and social media strategies.

A chance to work on exciting projects and experiment with new content ideas.

Competitive pay based on experience and performance.
